name: Noir Detective
description:
Noir Detective is a 2D stealth game that takes place in 30’s Chicago.

As a private detective, you investigate on mysterious disappearances probably linked to the mafia. You will infiltrate on their territory to learn more about those cases.
But something darker lies behind this enigma… The more clues you discover, the more you’ll get yourself trapped in the nonsense and madness.

In Noir Detective, you can either be stealthy or aggressive, it is up to you. But beware; facing more than one enemy at once may lead you to your demise. Your objective is to reach the end of the level alive.

We recommend using a game pad for a better game experience.

Noir Detective alpha version was made as a learning project of five weeks with Unity in C#.
